Subject: Lessons for creating policies
Description: Hi, we are going to be enforcing this DLP tool for our users. I had a meeting last week to go over simple stuff. I would like to have another Zoom meeting so I can ask more general questions about combining policies together to create good security standing. I am free Monday from 9:30am-12pm Pacific Time (PT), and 2pm-5pm PT. On Tuesday, I am free all day.
Solution_Comment__c: Discussed CAP policies, different use cases and scenarios + tested different scenarios.
